message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,300,000. It's a valuable asset, and I believe this price reflects its worth.  Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $1,150,000. This price is based on my budget constraints and my assessment of the product's worth. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still not able to come down to $1,150,000. How about we meet in the middle at $1,250,000? This is a fair price considering the value of the product. I'm open to further discussion if you're willing to come up a bit.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am able to offer $1,200,000 for the product. This aligns closely with your original asking price and my budget. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
